text:
At first I thought it was the particular recipe I was using, but as I kept trying out different muffin and cupcake recipe's the result remained the same and I'm quite heartbroken ğŸ˜‚
I've also changed the flour I've been using ( regular cake flour, white flour, etc) but it's been the same. I see other people's cupcakes and muffins and they're always so spongy, soft and light. The completely opposite of mine.
Don't get me wrong, the muffins I make are great in the moment but they tend to harden the next day or later that day, you know?
I just wanted to know if it's something I'm using even though it's standard recipes? Is my over too hot? ( even though I preheat it as the recipe instructs ) what am I doing wrong?
Any advice would be so greatly appreciated. Thank You for taking time to read this!
